metadata.title: Professional Experience Enhancement
metadata.description: Transform job descriptions into compelling achievement narratives with quantified impact

use_cases.case: Individual role enhancement with impact metrics

context_integration.role_context: You are enhancing experience for a {seniority_level} professional in a {role_type} position at {company_context}. This role involved {primary_responsibilities} with particular emphasis on {key_focus_areas}. The professional demonstrated {achievement_patterns} and contributed to {business_outcomes}.
context_integration.achievement_framework: The enhancement should emphasize {enhancement_focus} while maintaining authenticity. Key differentiators include {unique_contributions} supported by {evidence_indicators}. This experience positions them for {career_trajectory} in the {target_market}.

enhancement_philosophy.achievement_principles: - Transform passive descriptions into active impact statements - Quantify achievements with specific metrics whenever possible - Emphasize technical depth and innovation where applicable - Highlight leadership and mentoring contributions - Connect individual contributions to broader business outcomes - Maintain authenticity while maximizing professional positioning

enhancement_criteria.criterion: Include specific numbers, percentages, or scale indicators
Use strong action verbs, avoid passive descriptions
Include specific technologies and technical approaches
Connect technical work to business value
Highlight mentoring, leading, or influencing activities
Emphasize novel approaches or creative problem-solving

validation_requirements.requirement: Include specific technical stack and tools used
Evidence level clearly indicated for each claim
Balance technical contributions with business impact

output_specification.detailed_schema: enhanced_experience: { "position": "Enhanced job title with technical depth", "company": "Company name and context", "period": "Employment period", "enhanced_summary": "Compelling 1-2 sentence role summary", "key_achievements": [ { "achievement": "Quantified achievement with impact", "impact_metrics": { "quantified_impact", "business_value", "technical_complexity" }, "evidence_level": "documented|estimated|contextual", "technologies_used": ["specific", "technologies"] } ], "technical_contributions": ["specific technical innovations"], "leadership_indicators": ["leadership activities with scope"], "technologies": [{"technology", "proficiency", "context"}] }

reasoning_chain.enhancement_methodology:
For each experience element, apply this methodology: 1. Identify measurable outcomes and quantify where possible 2. Transform passive descriptions into active achievement statements 3. Add technical depth and specific technology context 4. Connect individual contributions to team/business outcomes 5. Highlight unique approaches or innovative solutions 6. Validate enhancement claims against available evidence
Prioritize enhancements that: - Are supported by concrete evidence - Demonstrate progressive responsibility - Show technical growth and innovation - Indicate leadership potential or experience
reasoning_chain.quantification_strategy:
Apply quantification where evidence supports: - Performance improvements (speed, efficiency, quality) - Scale indicators (users, transactions, data volume) - Cost savings or revenue generation - Team size or project scope - Time savings or process improvements - User satisfaction or adoption metrics
When exact numbers aren't available, use: - Relative improvements ("50% reduction in...") - Scale approximations ("thousands of users") - Comparative statements ("significantly improved...")
